Job Description:

- មានវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រការសិក្សាផ្នែកអគ្គិសនី មេកានិច ឬវិញ្ញាបណ្ណបត្រការសិក្សាដែលមានពាក់ព័ន្ធ

- មានអត្តចរិតស្លូតបូត និងគោររពតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់អ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
- ប្រាក់ខែមូលដ្ឋានអាស្រ័យលើការរសម្ភាសន៍ជាក់ស្ដែង
- ផ្តល់ថ្លៃអាហារ 50% និងកន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ (ស្អាត,មិនគិតថ្លៃសេវា)

- គោរពច្បាប់សុខភាព និងសុវត្ថិភាពសង្គម
Company Profile:
Golden Rice is a Cambodian rice miller and exporter international standard company,specialized in producing high-quality Cambodian Jasmine Rice product since 2009,equipped with state-of-the-art machinery and technology for drying, milling and packaging rice for export market, and winner of the Best Rice in the World award in 2012.
Beside its rice processing and exporting activities, Golden Rice is developing its own construction and engineering projects, such as industrial building construction, machinery & electrical installation, and R&D on agricultural engineering.

job title: Assistant Tax Accountant Manager ($700-$900) Koh Pich
position: Assistant Tax Accountant Manager ($700-$900) Koh Pich
Job Description: -Review, setup and re-enforce standard finance & accounting procedures & policies.-Monitor, analyze accounting data and provide recommendations-Prepare monthly financial reports and ensure the accurate and correctness-Prepare monthly and annual tax report-Handle tax audit from GDT-Liaise with the external auditor and tax agents-Support all tax operational activities internal and external-Assist tax on verification and processing of tax return filing (VAT, withholding tax, prepayment on profit tax, annual tax and patent tax), -Regularly update tax guideline/Practice/Parkas to relevant departments.-Provide practical recommendations on good tax practice.-Other task that assigned by company
Job Requirement: - Bachelor or Master degree in Finance, Accounting, or a related field- More than 03 year experiences in finance, Accounting & Tax work - Good knowledge of general principle of accounting and Cambodia tax law - Hand-on experience with accounting software (SAP, Sage, QuickBooks,..)- Have good proficiency Microsoft Office- Have good command in English- Have good leadership skills- Good interpersonal, communication and problem solving skill- Honest, positive attitude, good team player - Be able to work overtime if necessary- Salary rank : $700-$900- Working Hour :8am to 5pm - Working Days : Mon to Fri- Working Location : Koh Pich
Contact Info: Contact Information Belly (Mr.)  HR Manager 069222004 hrecruitment88@gmail.com Phnom Penh #4A1, St.22BT, Beoung Tumpun I, Mean Chey, Phnom Penh, Cambodia. 069222004

Job Description:
-	Develop job adverts before putting them out on different advertising platforms. Prepare job announcement and posting to all recruitment channels (websites, Facebook, agencies etc…). Follow up recruitment status with agency.
-	Assist for any recruitment activities or events (career fair, career presentation at universities etc.).
-	Headhunting, attracting new talents match with the job requirement.
-	Arrange shortlisted candidates to take relevant assessment, mark and record results accurately to contribute to the recruitment decision.
-	Assist in selection process, by interviewing applicants, reviewing their test and certificates, manage all steps until hiring process
-	To ensure that recruitment is filled base on the deadline of manpower request.
-	Manage and update candidate’s profile database.
-	Weekly update about recruitment status to the manager.
-	 Assists in the interviewing and hiring of Human Resource employee team members with the appropriate skills, as needed. 
-	Other tasks assign by Manager
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor’s degree in Human Resources Management or Business Administration or any related field.
-	Minimum 2 years of experiences and knowledge of HR recruitment, tools in human resource management.
-	Has knowledge about Job Description preparation; 
-	Has knowledge about Document Management; 
-	Understand Labor Law, Contract Law, Regulation, Prakas, and Announcement of MOL, NBC, and MOC
-	Has Knowledge about Office Administration
-	Communication and Interpersonal skills
-	Analytical, mathematical, and problem solving skills
-	Be Patience, Honest, and trustworthy
-	Be able to speak, read, and write English 
-	The ability to work under pressure and to deadlines
-	Good Computer skills such as Ms. Word, Excel, Power Point, Internet and Email
-	Analyzing & Interpreting
-	Effective Negotiation skills is preferable
-	Excellence in interpersonal and communication skills and able to communicate with people at all levels.
-	Have working experiences in heavy industrial or manufacturing is preferable.
